Name: FukTopia 5
About the game: FukTopia 5 is a frantic post apocalyptic Top Down game. Procedural Level Generation Each level is orocedural with random elements so you will be faced with unique levels each time you play. The fast-paced action is spiced up with a beautiful art found throughout the procedural level generation each time you play. Gameplay The player enter into a procedural generated level and need to clear the entire level from enemies to go to the next level. Features - Every game is different - procedural levels - Amazing Pixel Art
